verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: should] not have even been on the first three Forbes 400 lists , according to journalist Jon Greenberg . He got there by lying . The first time , in 1982 , he claimed to be worth $ 100Million when he was in fact worth $ 5Million , a drop in the ...
